attributes.action: Take These E-Petitions Seriously For A Change!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
theres plenty of petitions, but how many of them are actually responded to or acted upon?

not that many is my guess, because seemingly, most have been completely IGNORED!!!!!

gordon brown TAKE THE PUBLIC SERIOUSLY!

rejection.details: if you have any comments about the e-petition system, please e-mail: team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
